src:
近大、次は「ニホンウナギ」…完全養殖目指す

01 Nov 2019, 13:10



孵化から４０日たったニホンウナギの稚魚。体長は約２センチ（近畿大提供）

　マグロの完全養殖に成功した近畿大水産研究所（和歌山県白浜町）は１日、出荷量が減少しているニホンウナギの完全養殖を目指すと発表した。早ければ４年後に食用のウナギとして試験的に販売し、将来は商品化も狙うという。
　同研究所は今年、中断していた養殖ウナギの研究を再開し、９月に人工孵化（ふか）に成功した。１１月１日までに飼育期間は５０日に達しており、これらを親魚まで育て、産卵させて卵を得るサイクルの確立を目指す。
　ウナギの完全養殖は２０１０年に水産総合研究センター（現・水産研究・教育機構）が成功したが、コストが高く商品化には至っていない。同研究所は、稚魚が好む餌の開発や効率的な飼育法を研究する。
　完全養殖の実験は同研究所の浦神実験場（同県那智勝浦町）が行う。近大は昨年、１０年に完全養殖に成功した田中秀樹氏を場長に起用した。田中氏は１日の記者会見で「完全養殖を実現して、ウナギを安定的に供給できるようにしたい」と抱負を述べた。
text:
Jindai, next "Japanese eel" ... Aim for complete aquaculture

01 Nov 2019, 13:10



Japanese eel fry just 40 days after hatching. About 2 cm long (provided by Kinki University)

The Kinki University of Fisheries Research Institute (Shirahama Town, Wakayama Prefecture), which succeeded in complete aquaculture of tuna, announced on the 1st that it aims to complete aquaculture of Japanese eels whose shipping volume is decreasing. It will be sold as an edible eel after four years at the earliest, and it will be commercialized in the future.
The research center resumed research on cultured eel that had been suspended this year and succeeded in artificial hatching in September. By November 1st, the breeding period has reached 50 days, and we aim to establish a cycle in which these are raised to parent fish and laid to obtain eggs.
The complete aquaculture of eels was succeeded by the Fisheries Research Center (currently the Fisheries Research and Education Organization) in 2010, but it has been costly and has not yet been commercialized. The institute will study the development of food that fry prefers and efficient breeding methods.
The complete aquaculture experiment is conducted by the Uragami Experiment Station (Nachikatsuura Town, the same prefecture). Last year, Hideki Tanaka, who succeeded in complete aquaculture in 10 years, was appointed as the director. Mr. Tanaka expressed his aspiration at the press conference on the 1st, “I want to realize complete aquaculture and provide a stable supply of eel”.
